content.text:
# List of chairmen of the State Assembly of the Sakha Republic__disambig_1

Chairmen of the State Assembly of the Sakha Republic.
It was preceded by the Supreme Soviet. The legislature was bicameral 1994-2003 and consisted of the Chamber of the Republic and the House of Representatives.
Chairmen of the Supreme Soviet
{| class="wikitable"
! Name
! Period
|-
|Mikhail Nikolayev
|April 25, 1990–December 1991
|-
|Kliment Ivanov
|December 1991–January 1994
|}
Chairmen of the Chamber of the Republic
{| class="wikitable"
! Name
! Period
|-
|Egor Larionov
|January 1994–1998
|-
|Vladimir Filippov
|1998–2003
|}
Chairmen of the House of Representatives
{| class="wikitable"
! Name
! Period
|-
|A. P. Illarionov
|1994–1998
|-
|Nikolay Solomov
|1998–2003
|}
Chairmen of the State Assembly of the Sakha Republic
{|class="wikitable"
!Name
!Period
|-
|Nikolay Solomov
|January 23, 2003–May 18, 2005
|-
|Nurgun Timofeyev
|May 19, 2005–2008
|-
|Vitaly Basygysov
|March 2008–Present
|}
